-h|--help: --- show this help message and exit
--version: --- Print the version of fpp and exit.
--clean: --- Remove the state files that fpp uses when starting up, including the previous input used and selection pickle.
-ko|--keep-open: --- keep PathPicker open once a file selection or command is performed.
-a|--all: --- Automatically select all available lines once the interactive editor has been entered.
